sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"非正式的，非正规的"之意。
means: irregular ： 指不按常规、固定模式或计划做事；或指不隶属于任何机构或组织。
casual ： 指不太注意场合，仪表等，随意性强。
informal ： 指语言、穿着等随便，也指不举行任何形式或仪式的活动。

sentence.Network_en: Council members are due to have informal discussions later on today.
sentence.Network_cn: 委员会成员定于今日晚些时候进行非正式讨论。

sentence.Network_en: The two leaders will retire to Camp David for informal discussions.
sentence.Network_cn: 两位领导人将到戴维营进行非正式讨论。

sentence.Network_en: Our aim was that these meetings be unstructured and informal.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的目的是，这些会议不事先进行精心组织，要随意一些。

entry.tran: (言辞或行为)非正式的，亲切随便的
entry.def: Informal speech or behaviour is relaxed and friendly rather than serious, very correct, or official.

example.tran: 她不拘礼节,让人耳目一新。

example.ex: His friend was less good-looking, but a lot more informal and relaxed.
example.tran: 他的朋友没那么英俊,却随意、放松得多。

entry.def: An informal situation is one which is relaxed and friendly and not very serious or official.

example.ex: I would like it to be an informal occasion...
example.tran: 我希望把它办得不那么正式。

example.ex: The house has an informal atmosphere.
example.tran: 房间里有一种轻松随意的氛围。

entry.tran: (衣服)非正式场合穿的,休闲的
entry.def: Informal clothes are casual and suitable for wearing when you are relaxing, but not on formal occasions.

example.ex: Most of the time Jenny needs informal clothes...
example.tran: 大部分时间珍妮需要休闲服装。
吃午饭时可以穿休闲服。

entry.def: You use informal to describe something that is done unofficially or casually without planning.

example.ex: The two leaders will retire to Camp David for informal discussions.
example.tran: 两位领导人将到戴维营进行非正式讨论。

sentences.sentence: "a loose organization of the local farmers"

means.word_mean: 3. used of spoken and written language
4. having or fostering a warm or friendly atmosphere; especially through smallness and informality;

sentences.sentence: "the small room was cozy and intimate"

auth_sentence.content: It will be an informal, joyful learning process.

auth_sentence.res_content: Which informal verb means 'to study very hard'?

Sentence.sentence: Its informal conversational style would make interaction comfortable, and yet the machine would remain slightly unpredictable and therefore interesting.
Its informal conversational style would make interaction comfortable, and yet the machine would remain slightly unpredictable and therefore interesting.
It has a very informal atmosphere, quite unlike some grand houses you visit.

jushi.english: They agreed to hold an informal meeting.
jushi.chinese: 他们同意举行一次非正式的会议。

jushi.english: The party will be informal, so you needn't dress up.
jushi.chinese: 这场聚会是非正式的,因此你不必盛装。
她与所有的人打交道都不拘泥于礼节。
